page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content: }THE POPULATION IN OUR AREA COMES IN TWO MAIN GROUPS. THE RAF MARRIED QUARTERS ATTACHED TO THE RAF STATION AT ODIHAM ARE, PARTLY, IN OUR AREA. IN THESE QUARTERS, MOST OF THE FAMILIES ARE YOUNG AND DO NOT STAY IN THE AREA LONG. THE OTHER MAIN ELEMENT OF POPULATION IS BASED ON THD TWO VILLAGES OF LONG SUTTON AND SOUTH WARNBOROUGH. IN THESE TWO VERY SMALL VILLAGES MANY OF THE PEOPLE ARE FAIRLY WEALTHY BECAUSE THE HOUSES ARE USUALLY VERY VERY EXPENSIVE. THERE ARE SOME PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN THE SMALL COUNCIL ESTATES IN THE TWO VILLAGES BUT MOST PEOPLE OWN THEIR OWN HOUSES. IN A SMALL SURVEY THAT WE TOOK, WE DISCOVERED THAT ONLY 6% OF OUR PARENTS HAD BEEN BORN IN OUR AREA.
